scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/common/dist && rm -rf packages/google/dist && rm -rf packages/naver/dist
scripts.copy:lib: cp -r lib/common/lib packages/common/dist && cp -r lib/google/lib packages/google/dist && cp -r lib/naver/lib packages/naver/dist
scripts.copy:dist: cp -r dist/common packages/common/dist && cp -r dist/google packages/google/dist && cp -r dist/naver packages/naver/dist
scripts.copy:type: cp packages/common/lib/index.d.ts packages/common/dist && cp packages/google/lib/index.d.ts packages/google/dist && cp packages/naver/lib/index.d.ts packages/naver/dist
scripts.prepare: npm run compile && npm run build && npm run clean && npm run copy:dist
